The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Revenue Per Email Sent

Also known as: RPE

A metric that describes the amount of money generated per email. The higher the better.

Can be calculated by dividing revenue generated per campaign by the number of emails sent.
